briefdescription.para: Configure a serial port's baud rate.

detaileddescription.para: USART is enabled in single buffer transmission mode, multibuffer receiver mode, 8n1.
Serial port must have a baud rate configured to work properly.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum number of bytes to transmit

briefdescription.para: Transmit an unsigned integer to the specified serial port in decimal format.

detaileddescription.para: This function blocks until the integer's digits have been completely transmitted.

briefdescription.para: Transmit one character on a serial port.

detaileddescription.para: This function blocks until the character has been successfully transmitted.

briefdescription.para: Transmit a character string on a serial port.

detaileddescription.para: This function blocks until str is completely transmitted.

briefdescription.para: Read one character from a serial port.

detaileddescription.para: It's not safe to call this function if the serial port has no data available.

briefdescription.para: Return the amount of data available in a serial port's RX buffer.

simplesect.para: Number of bytes in dev's RX buffer.

briefdescription.para: Discard the contents of a serial port's RX buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Serial port whose buffer to empty.
